name: Ext_R5_DeviceDefinition_co_version
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DeviceDefinition.conformsTo.version for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceDefinition.conformsTo.version from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: The specific form or variant of the standard, specification or formal guidance
element.definition: Identifies the specific form or variant of the standard, specification, or formal guidance. This may be a 'version number', release, document edition, publication year, or other label.
element.comment: `DeviceDefinition.specialization.version` maps to R4 `DeviceDefinition.specialization.version`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
